```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(lubridate)
dates <- seq.Date(from=lubridate::ymd("2017-01-01"), to=lubridate::ymd("2017-08-01"), by=20)
df <- data.frame(Date=dates, ID = seq(length(dates)))


library(dplyr)
link <- data.frame(From=ymd("2017-01-01"), Num=1:12)
link <- mutate(link, From1 = From %m+% months(Num))
link <- mutate(link, To = From1, From = lag(From1))
link$From[1] <- ymd("2017-01-01")
link <- select(link, From, To) %>% mutate(Month = month.name)
link
```

```{r}
df %>% head(3)
```
```{r}
link %>% head(3)
```

```{r}
df %>% mutate(Dummy = 1) %>% 
  left_join(link %>% mutate(Dummy = 1)) %>% 
  filter(Date >= From, Date <= To) %>% 
  select(-Dummy, -From, -To) %>% 
  head(3)
```
